title: A$$icons
content:
For use in polite foruming against people you don't like:

(|) Regular a$$

(_|_) Fat a$$

{_|_} flabby a$$

(x) Ki$$ my a$$

(E=Mc2) Smart a$$

(?) Dumba$$

[This post is not endorsed by EZBoard, or any of its susidiaries. No forum members were hurt during the making of the post, and only three kittens drowned.]

A proud member of the signature stealing society

-Levellord

title: Turn the other cheek!
content:
Meh. It's only a bunch of curves and lines. The only thing I don't like about the post is that ass is censored.

Amusing, LL.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-moon.gif[/img] Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

The development of the hardware, and the greater ability to express every idea that flies into a programmers head, mean that game creators have made the new games congested with every technique in their power. The basic games behind all this are so blurred that people cant catch up. We should go back to basics like Pac-Man and play in an easier, more relaxed way. -Toru Iwatani

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]
